title: City and Colour Live in Europe - Cardiff, Wales
description:
This is the official live recording of the Cardiff St David's Hall show of City and 

Colour's European "Little Hell" tour on October 13th 2011.



The disc was recorded by concertlive and made available directly after the show.

The recordings often seem to spew slightly into the next allotted track, 

but abar the track i have labeled into 2 parts and the "Encore Silence" track 

(which is basically 30sec of the end of sorrowing man then complete silence) 

it really shouldn't bother you.


I ripped this quickly from the original disc i bought after the show a while ago, 

but since i gave the actual disc to an ex its the only copy i have now.

So on average most tracks are around the 192kps mark.


The song tags on the tracks are not the best. I have named the actual files as the 

song names but they still come up as 'audiotrack1' etc.. in media player.

They were just ripped to my laptop as the 3 separate dics with no track names

So ive gone through listening what everything is, renamed them and put them as one.

Im sure you can manage to tag them as you see fit because im tired of it now! aha


It was an amazing show, the welsh humor battling with Dallas Green's was amusing.


Total duration 1 hour 44 min approx



Track listing:


1. We Found Each Other in the Dark 

2. The Death of Me 

3. Waiting... 

4. The Grand Optimist 

5. As Much as I Ever Could 

6. Weightless 

7. Day Old Hate 

8. Body in a Box 

9. What Makes a Man? 

10. The Girl 

11. Little Hell 

12. Sleeping Sickness 

13. Fragile Bird 

14. Sorrowing Man 

15. Comin' Home 

16. Sometimes (I Wish)



Yeah this file took ages to put together, utter pain. But its such a great show!



Enjoy :)
